#summary Install non7top overlay.
#labels gentoo,overlay

= Installation =

You can install this overlay in three different ways - manual, via layman and via paludis.

== Portage ==

Create a directory for this overlay (I use /usr/local/overlays/non7top) then execute this commands. Then you should edit /etc/make.conf and modify PORTDIR_OVERLAY variable accordingly
Then execute this commands
{{{
# cd /usr/local/overlays
# svn checkout http://non7top.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/overlay non7top
}}}
